data.text: @Rob_Colligan Hi Rob, I can tell you're really upset with the situation. Please send us a DM of her booking reference number and her complete name. Thanks! -Lee

@runfoxrun Hi @runfoxrun, I can tell you're really upset with the situation. We’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.
@fadesmond Hey Fiona! There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great customer service experience. Thanks for letting us know! - Bree
@DebEAger Hi Deb, I can tell you're disappointed. We’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.

@davidjfindlay I understand where your coming from David.  Carry on baggage limits and checked baggage allowances are outlined during the booking process. We also advise these restrictions on the itinerary we send to you. You can also check this link: https://t.co/lsILRxi9aj Thank! -Lee
@TanyaWilks Hi Tanya, I can confirm that we already replied back to you. Thanks - Norine
@MelissaWaites Hi Melissa, this must be very tough as it sounds. Please send us a DM of your booking and your complete name so that we can see what we can do. Thanks! -Lee
@TanyaWilks Hi Tanya, we'd like to see what we can do. Could you send us a DM with your complete name and your booking reference number, please? -Lee

@sparky_moira Hi MC, we never like having to cancel a flight and I appreciate this must be frustrating for you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@Sanchit25jogie Hi Sanchit, we'd like to look into this. Please send us a DM with your full name and booking reference. Thanks - Leslie

@VictoriaVblue Hi Victoria, thanks for reaching out! Our Jetstar keychain is only available for purchase on board, so we recommend speaking with one of our friendly cabin crew next time you fly with us. 😊 Thanks - Leslie

@davidjfindlay Hi David, your carry-on allowance is separate to your checked baggage allowance. To make sure that there’s room for everyone’s bags, we have a team of cabin baggage officers making sure customers are boarding with the correct amount of luggage. Thanks - Leslie
@ian_booth Hi Ian, Our team is always open to new ideas and is evaluating our schedules all the time to see if we can offer this. Thanks for this! - Norine

@WellyJules Hi Jules, we limit carry on to 7kgs in total for each passenger – including things like handbags and laptop bags. If you think you might need a little more next time you travel, you can purchase an extra 7kgs online before you fly. Thanks – Chichi

data.text: @Britnyellen Hi Berticuss, we’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver, so we’d like to look into this further. If you could DM us with your details, we’d like to sort this out for you. Thanks – Chichi
@ReallyRew Hi, Rebecca. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan
@matt2perk That’s not the standard we set for our aircrafts, Matthew – thanks for letting us know. We’ve passed this onto our cleaners. - Bree
@ItsImogenGreene That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, @ItsImogenGreene. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Ralph.
@xlr82xs That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, @xlr82xs. Thanks for letting us know so we can look into what happened here. Thanks - Ryan
@SashaStubbs8 Hello Sasha. I recognise your disappointment. We would investigate this further for you. I highly recommend sending us a Dm. Thanks. - Ryan
@NicholasMagro2 Hi Nicholas, we'd like to check this further for you. Please send us a DM here on Twitter. Thanks! -Lee

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @jivebong Hey @jivebong. There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! - Ryan

@ItsBenParks Thanks for your tweet Ben. We’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver and we appreciate your feedback. We will pass this on to the relevant team for improvement. Thanks - Chichi
@mona_almas_ Hi @mona_almas_,  clearly this is very important to you. We’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks Ralph.

@nathanebush Thanks for your tweet. If you need to make changes to your booking after its been finalised, change fees and any fare difference between the flight you booked and the cost of your new preferred flight may apply. You may send us a DM us if you need assistance. Thanks - Chichi
@LauraLorikeet This is so kind of you Laura! Thank you so much. -Lee
@jenthedon1 Hi Jen, would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks – Leslie
@saimigi_head We'd like to look at this. Please send us a DM here on Twitter with your booking details, Thanks! -Lee

data.text: @saimigi_head Hi there, our baggage team are best placed to assist with this! For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks - Bree

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @newietraveller Hey there, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on to Gaby, Sam and all the other staff/crew you mentioned, they’ll be stoked to hear it. - Bree
Love was in the air last night on JQ419 when a customer surprised his girlfriend with an on-board proposal. Watch the video here @jetstarnewsroom https://t.co/nl1Qe9NJag

@nathan_edz That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, Nathan. Thanks for letting us know. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Norine
@jivebong Hi Jessica, I'm sorry to hear that. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd like to look into this for you. Thanks - Leslie
@LiaJHarris Hi Lia, I appreciate how upsetting it can be when travel plans change especially when you have a family event. Please DM us with your booking reference so we can assist. Thanks – Chichi
@samitshankar Hi Samit, I understand that you are unable to use your voucher. Please send us a DM so we can look into this further. Thanks - Leslie
@antmandan That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Daniel! – and we’re sure the agent who assisted you will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! -  Cheers! - Dan

@djpaine I’m glad to hear that this was sorted out for you. Please be assured that we do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary and we appreciate your understanding. Looking forward to welcoming you back onboard again soon. Thanks – Chichi

@djpaine Hi DJ Paine, I appreciate how upsetting it can be when travel plans change - if you require assistance with rebooking your flight or would like to explore alternative options, please DM us with your booking reference so we can assist. Thanks - Chichi
@julesaj1 Hi Julie, sorry to hear this. Would you mind shooting us a DM with your booking reference and full name so we can help you out? Thanks - Maddi
@reid_butler9 That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Reid – and we’re sure Mark Adams will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Ryan

@thepunt Hi @thepunt, yes that is correct. Once you have already joined successfully to the Club Jetstar Membership, you will have exclusive access for discounted flights for members and you can join now on this link https://t.co/8yJqDUHJqo. Cheers! - Dan
@thepunt Hi there! Join the club now via https://t.co/NSNWj5jOfv. Thanks! - Bree
@Tim_Hein Hey  Tim, we're sorry to hear about this. Please contact us directly via DM so we can check this further. Thanks - Chichi
@itsvivpai Hi Viv, sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website. It may help if you clear or delete the cache/cookies saved in your browser. Thanks - Lee
@gobacktopoland Hi there, we'd like to check this one for you. Can you send us a DM about this issue. -Lee
@alison_cray That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Alison – and we’re sure our team will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Thanks, Ralph.

@lucky703 Hi Anne, thanks for your tweet. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. If you need further assistance, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@TchhhTchhhh Hi Marc, you can send us a DM here on Twitter. -Lee

data.text: @MagConception Hi Mag, we’d like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message for us to further assist you. Thanks, Jaya
@TchhhTchhhh Hi Marc, we’d like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message for us to further assist you. Thanks, Jaya
@jxeeno Hi there, I can tell you're frustrated and I'm sorry for the inconvenience. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya

@manitbhaskar Hi Manit, thanks for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about your canceled flight. You can also check your option through Manage booking on our website. If you want to discuss this further you can send us a direct message here. Thanks - Jaya
@deryk_d Hi Damian, I certainly understand your frustration with this. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Norine
@tara_welly Hi Tara, we’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Could you please DM us with your booking reference and full name? Thanks – Leslie
@l_j_wat Hi there, can you send us a DM so we can look into this further? Thanks - Bree
@DMacKinnonAU Hi @DMacKinnonAU. We would investigate this further for you. Please send us DM for us to check this for you. Thanks - Ryan

@ChattyinOz Hi Sharene, I appreciate how stressful this is for you. We'd really want to assist you with this. Please send us a direct message for us to get more information about your booking. Thanks - Jaya
@sbou__ Hi there. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@ChattyinOz Hi, Sharene. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan

@ItsBenParks We’d like to look into this for you, Ben – as we’re usually really proud of the experience we provide our customers. Could you please DM us so we can look into this further? Thanks - Norine
@apollo323 Hi Ben, can you send us a DM so we look into this for you? Thanks - Bree
@rhihuahua_ Hi Rhian, I understand that you’re disappointed and we’d really like to assist. Please DM so we can sort this out. Thanks – Chichi
@elflexo4 Hi there, while delays are hard to plan for, you can be certain that our team is working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. If you need further assistance please send us a DM. Thanks, Jaya

@nathanebush I understand. Due to the sale that is still going on, our website is having some concerns about finalizing your flight. May I know have you tried to use another browser or clearing the cache and cookies of your browser? Thanks - Ryan.
@nathanebush Hi Nathan. We would investigate this further for you. Please send us A DM. Thanks, Ryan
@mcgoo1972 Hi Scott, our flights are subject for availability, but you can always check our website for available schedule from Avalon to Gold Coast from time to time. Thanks - Bree

@goudagoddess Hi there, thanks for reaching out! You can bring a Hairspray on your carry-on bag as long as it is a non-flammable kind of spray. You may also check on our website the Prohibited Carry-on baggage items here: https://t.co/DW2j9t40YM - Jaya
@CarlosMM_ Hi Carlo, we'd like to check this one for you. Please send us a DM of your voucher details, please. -Lee
@SebasBonell Hello, Sebastián. We would like to investigate this for you. Please send us DM for us to give a better resolution and update on your flight. Thank you. - Ryan.

@thelochok Hi Lachlan. our seating is designed to industry standards – but we understand there’s not always heaps of room for improvement. You can always request a seat for their flight or you can coordinate this with our check-in counter so that you can have a relaxing flight. Thanks, Ryan

@thelochok Hey Lachlan, your travel with us should always be relaxing and enjoyable. We offer our customers the opportunity to request a specific seat for their flight during the booking process or via Manage Booking so you can be comfortable on your trip. Thanks - Chichi

@honeyandvodka Hi Jo, it must be very difficult for you and your family to seat apart. I’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.

@elpresi_1 Hi Oscar, I can tell you're disappointed. Your feedback is very important to us please note that our staff are very strict since this might cause inconvenience to other passengers and thank you so much for your understanding. -Lee
@JamesJesenthon Hi Lawrence, it must have been very difficult for you. I’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.

@emmastacey_ Hi Em, I appreciate how frustrating it is to be stuck at the airport for such a long time. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a DM with your booking reference. Thanks - Leslie
@Savehissoule Hi Day, we'd like to look at this one for you. Please send us a DM of your booking reference number and your complete name, please. -Lee

@alexday63 Hi Alby. I know it doesn't change the situation for you, but I can assure you that we would not have made the changes unless it was necessary. Sometimes we need to make adjustments so we can continue to provide all our customers with our everyday low fares. -Lee
@lesposen That's great to hear, @lesposen! Have a great flight. :) Thanks - Leslie
@lesposen Hi Les, we have escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Thanks –Lee

@GregRandall1 Hi Yazza! The Qantas Frequent Flyer members are eligible to earn QFF Points and Status credits when traveling on Plus, Max, and Business Max fares. On Jetstar New Zealand domestic flights, members can earn Qantas Points only on Starter fares. https://t.co/ElhA0xKne9 Thanks - Jaya

urls.title: Qantas Frequent Flyer | Jetstar
urls.description: Qantas Frequent Flyer members can earn Qantas Points and Status Credits on selected Jetstar fares. Learn how to earn and use your points with Jetstar.

data.text: @catnapster Hi @catnapster, it must have been very difficult for you and your family. I’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.

@KrankyKoala16 Hi Lynda, we appreciate your feedback and please be assured that we have escalated your concerns to the relevant team. If you would like to provide any additional feedback, feel free to DM us with your booking details. Thanks – Bree
@long_pantss Hi Sean, we’d really appreciate the chance to take another look into this for you. Please send us a DM of your Booking reference number and your complete names, please. -Lee

@KrankyKoala16 Hi, masks are mandatory on all flights and in all airports across Australia except where a medical exemption exists. We escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. - Jaya
@Teeksnbas Hi there, we’d like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message so we can further assist you. Thanks, Jaya

@BennSocialist I recognize your disappointment and I know that this is not the outcome that you are expecting. Please allow us to make things for you. One of our Case Managers will be the one to sort things for you. Please check you email from time to time for further updates. Thanks, Ryan.

@trawg Hi David, we’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver, so we’d like to take a look into this for you. Please send us a DM with your full name and booking reference. Thanks – Leslie
@taybenlor Hi, Ben. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, -Jay
@LMerc25 I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience, Merc. Can you please send us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we can look into this further? Thanks - Bree

@Ben_Shute Hi Ben, we always aim to have sufficient staff available to assist our passengers at the airport from the time check-in opens for a flight until the flight departs. Can you please DM so we can share this with our airport team? Thanks, - Dan
@RahulKu55994921 Hi Rahul, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@KirstyWebeck Hello Kristy. we are more than happy to assist you. Please send us a DM of your booking reference number and your complete name, please. -Lee
@mmjarchitects That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, @mmjarchitects – and we’re sure Megan will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Ralph
@Secretflyer2 Hello there, we'd like to investigate this for you. Can you send us a DM of your booking reference number and your complete names, please? -Lee

@GordonFarcas Hi Gordon, I’m very sorry to hear about your disrupted flight. We do our best to avoid delays but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require further assistance please send us a DM with more info, so we can see how we might be able to help. Thanks - Jaya
@Sophieha17 Hi Sophie, I'm sorry to hear that. Would you mind sending us a Direct Message (DM) so we can further assist you. Thanks - Norine

@itsrichard_e Hi Yung, clearly this is very important to you. I’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM) with your booking details and voucher number with your full name please. - Thanks, Ralph.

@DecayRSO I recognize your disappointment, @DecayRSO. Your feedback is very important to us. We will make sure that this will be passed to our team. In the meantime, you can contact our Reservation Team at this number 131 538 to process your payment and finalize your booking. Thanks, Ryan.
@DecayRSO Hi, Decay this must be very frustrating on your end. As I've checked, our system is working fine. I advise you to please contact your bank directly to discuss this matter. -Lee

@glenwith1nn Hi Glen, We’d like to look into this for you – as we’re usually proud of the experience our team help us deliver for customers. Could you please send us a DM so we can look into this further. Thanks - Norine
